author: The Hindu
title: Google rolls out India-specific website on COVID-19
description: It contains helpline numbers, content about symptoms, protective measures, known treatments, and the latest global and Indian statistics.
content:
Google on Tuesday rolled out an India-specific website on coronavirus that delivers comprehensive information about the pandemic, and how to stay productive during this time.
The website www.google.co.in/covid19 contains information such as key helpline numb… [+2000 chars]
